 URI URI.normalize()

Methods in java.net with parameters of type URI
static Hashtable<String,Object> URIHelper.getParameters(URI uri)
          Since a URI query can contain a single key multiple times, the responding parameter map will contain string values when a key appears only once, and string arrays when they key appears multiple times.
